{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = N450 WiFi Cable Modem Router |caption2 = Netgear N450 |pp = https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/cable-modems-routers/N450.aspx |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/N450 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Netgear_CG3000Dv2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = CG3000D |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N450 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY313300238, PY3UPWL6031H2 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = ACM6383 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM3383G;BCM3383GB0; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G200TF100; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L8006E; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B1G1646G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53124S; |cm_down_c = 8 |cm_up_c = 4 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 10:DA:43 |oui = 10:DA:43
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;2.6.30;eCos;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0, |addchip = Cable Modem LNA;Broadcom;BCM3413;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = CG3000Dv2XX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/15/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00HC0ZDOE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Pegatron UPWL6031H2 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ACM6383 REV:2.05A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Netgear CG4500BD|Netgear|List of DOCSIS Cable Modems}} The board could hold a second Mini PCIe card and has pads for a WAN port :and two phone jacks but these are not populated in the CG3000Dv2 model.
8x4 CableLabs certified DOCSIS 3.0
===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=395 '''Comcast''' device database entry]) *{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} (on [https://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/twc-compatible-modems.pdf '''Time Warner Cable''' compatible modems list]) *{{Approved by service|Spectrum}} (on [http://www.spectrum.net/support/internet/compliant-modems-charter-network/ '''Spectrum''' certified modems list]) *{{Approved by service|Cox}} (on [https://www.cox.com/residential/support/cox-certified-cable-modems.html '''Cox''' certified modems list], [https://www.cox.com/residential/support/netgear-cg3000dv2.html Details])
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GDC/datasheet/en/N450.pdf Datasheet] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/cg3000dv2 ''Netgear N450/CG3000Dv2'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
